1516741810_1AnFGL613gYqFWm4Lhwdk6x5gCRe1.body:
**Better torrent site**
The Pirate Bay will fall soon, I believe. They just recently lost their .se-address. When it falls apart, ZeroNet will have a huge opportunity to grow to humongous proportions, if it can just provide a New Pirate Bay. *One that is easy to use and accessible. The target audience is the same as The Pirate Bay.*



**Extend ZeroTalk into a full-fledged decentralized community**
* Simple personal pages - where you can link to your projects / other pages, or write stuff about yourself
* Personal messages - send messages to other people, encrypted of course



**CopyBazaar**
Open distributed market place. A copy of OpenBazaar, but built to run in ZeroNet. People can put up shops and offer their products, hold auctions or whatever. A distributed/decentralized Ebay.
* Could probably benefit from some integrated zeronet-wallet.
